background_context.situation: Utilizing apps and websites for event management
background_context.environment: Frequently accessing both mobile app and website for event updates
background_context.constraints: Issues with finding timely information about new events

goals_motivations.drives: Efficient management of events and staying updated on new postings
goals_motivations.achievements: Wants to easily access and understand event information to make informed decisions

behaviors_patterns.current_work_methods: Checks for new events through notifications and newsletters
behaviors_patterns.habits: Regularly uses the app but finds the website confusing

pain_points_frustrations.obstacles: Difficulty in identifying new events and their posting times
pain_points_frustrations.issues: Confusing interface for distinguishing between events; lack of upfront pricing information

needs_desires.improvements: A clearer, more organized way to see new events, possibly with visual indicators
needs_desires.requirements: Desires easy access to prices before committing to event details

attitudes_beliefs.mental_models: Believes that information should be easily accessible and clearly presented
attitudes_beliefs.preferences: Values user-friendly interfaces and timely updates

technical_comfort.technical_abilities: Comfortable using mobile applications, less so with websites
technical_comfort.learning_preferences: Prefers intuitive design and clear navigation

quotes: It was nice to see the price, too, before you click into it.
It’d be nice if it was... Here’s all the new stuff. It’s easy to find.
